newsitem.title: USA: Globalink sees $100,000 net in Q1.
newsitem.headline: Globalink sees $100,000 net in Q1.

text.p: Globalink Inc said Thursday it estimated it will have sales of $3.7 million and earnings of $100,000 for the first quarter ended March 31.
The company said that it was encouraged to see positive results following a reorganization at the end of the fourth quarter of 1996, during which it lost $2.3 million on sales of $2 million.
The company said expenditures are now under control and that it expects strong earnings in the future, if revenue growth can be maintained.
Net sales for the first quarter increased 82 percent over those fo the last quarter of 1996, said Globalink.
